description:
Are you ready to start your new life abroad?

TEFL Essentials: Thinking About Teaching English Abroad is for people who are thinking about teaching English abroad, wondering how to get started, or wondering if teaching English abroad is something they can actually do.

In short and easy to follow video lectures you will:

  • Discover the benefits of teaching English abroad

  • Learn commonly used TEFL terminology

  • Answer the top 14 questions about teaching English abroad

  • Get a taste of what to expect from a TEFL or CELTA course

  • Know how you can start teaching English abroad

In addition I’ve included an A-Z of ELT which you can download and refer to throughout your English teaching career.

Don’t waste time trawling the internet like I did. Join TEFL Essentials and take your first step towards teaching English abroad today!
title: TEFL Essentials: Thinking About Teaching English Abroad
